column1: Data Source: U.S. Department of Education National Center for Education Statistics Common Core of Data (CCD) "National Public Education Financial Survey (State Fiscal)" 2021-22 (FY 2022) v.1a; "Public Elementary/Secondary School Universe Survey" 2012-13 v.2a; "State Nonfiscal Public Elementary/Secondary Education Survey" 2012-13 v.1a  2022-23 v.1a.
† indicates that the data are not applicable.
– indicates that the data are missing.
‡ indicates that the data do not meet NCES data quality standards.
